name: Kitchen Utensil Holder- Spoon - Forked Up Art
description:
Why not buy something that makes you smile every time you look at it. Welcome to something different.

Perfect for the cook at any level; from household cooks to professionals. This very sturdy figurine holds a 28 oz. bar shaker that doubles perfectly for holding kitchen utensils.

Product Specs:

  • 4 inches wide x 5 inches deep x 12 inches tall
  • 100% Stainless Steel
  • Safe to hold liquid.
  • Approximate packaged weight: 1lb 8oz -Removable Shaker: 28oz. Capacity
  • Dishwasher Safe

name: Toothbrush Holder - Spoon - Forked Up Art
description:
Why not buy something that makes you smile every time you look at it. Welcome to something different.

Great for hors d'oeuvres, chocolate fountains, on the bar, or next to the good steak and potatoes. A great conversation piece to put out on the table for when company comes over. This piece duplicates as a shot glass stand, paper clip holder, and whatever else you want to put into the shot glass. A very popular piece that acts as a sure gift to loved ones and acquaintances.

Product Specs:

  • 4 inches wide x 3 inches deep x 12 inches tall
  • 100% Stainless Steel
  • Shot Glass: 2oz. capacity.
  • Safe to hold liquid.
  • Approximate packaged weight: 1lb 6oz
  • Dishwasher Safe

name: Salt and Pepper Holder - Spoon - Forked Up Art
description:
The perfect table-top butler to serve up the Salt and Pepper. Our most popular piece!! A great conversation starter for the table top. Shakers included!

Great for any size table because it doesn't take up too much space. Works in RV's, Restaurants, Bars, Kitchens (by the stove), dining rooms, out by the grill, at parties, and anywhere you would like to impress guests.

Product Specs:

  • 4 inches wide x 3 inches deep x 12 inches tall
  • 100% Stainless Steel
  • Shakers: 2oz. Squat Mushroom

name: Pencil Cup Holder - Spoon - Forked Up Art
description:
Why not buy something that makes you smile every time you look at it. Welcome to something different.

Great for the kitchen, by the phone, on the desk, in the office, or anywhere you want people to see it. Great for standard sized pens and pencils, and can double as a cinnamon-sugar/salt/spice dredge. Dredge included!

Product Specs:

  • 4 inches wide x 3 inches deep x 12 inches tall
  • 100% Stainless Steel
  • Holds 20 to 40 pencils.
  • Approximate packaged weight: 12.5oz.
  • Dishwasher Safe

name: Business Card Holder - Spoon - Forked Up Art
description:
Why not buy something that makes you smile every time you look at it. Welcome to something different.

One of our very first designs, and has been a favorite from the beginning. It not only holds cards, but points them out as well. This funny display will get compliments from customers like you have never seen!

Product Specs:

  • 4 inches wide x 3 inches deep x 12 inches tall
  • 100% Stainless Steel
  • Holds 20 to 40.
  • Approximate packaged weight: 12.5oz.
  • Dishwasher Safe
